content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Steam engine at position(-10.5, 22.5)
- Small electric poles at positions (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 18.5), (-15.5, 21.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5) 

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to lab power
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source that is functioning properly. Check the connections to electric poles and ensure they are powered.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to boiler fuel
- Ensure the boiler has fuel to operate. Check the inventory for available fuel sources and add them to the boiler.
